2.speaker: Gale
2.text: So, Lae'zel - have you ever been tempted to use psionics in your, erm, romantic endeavours?
2.context: NodeContext: Curiosity winning out over awkwardness

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Only once. Did you know, In low-gravity settings, githyanki can maintain aerial suspension for hours at a time?

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Fascinating - I think the archmage Tasha described a spell with similar effect. I really must look that up...
0.context: NodeContext: Latter part almost to self. Tasha as in 'Natasha'
